::Spears::

She followed him to the CR chamber room.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> "I got him," Striker says to Shadow Wing, walking forward and 
picking up 
> Rhinox, setting off toward the CR chambers. Having taken a few 
steps, the 
> panel above Striker's head detatches from the cealing, Striker 
barely jumping 
> back in time as the panel smashes into the floor. He breathes out a 
sigh of 
> relief, looking at Rhinox to make sure the bot wasn't hit by the 
panel.
> 
> "Be careful. This place is falling apart," Striker says, walking 
off again 
> toward the CR chamber, another panel smashing into the floor behind 
him.
